taks.name: Create VS Code Java workspace
taks.cmd: md "${global_cwd}\.vscode" && md "${global_cwd}\src" && md "${global_cwd}\lib" && (echo { & echo   "java.project.sourcePaths": ["src"], & echo   "java.project.outputPath": "bin", & echo   "java.project.referencedLibraries": ["lib/**/*.jar"] & echo }) > "${global_cwd}\.vscode\settings.json"
